import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { submitReport } from '../../services/api'; const ReportForm = ({ user }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ faculty_name: 'ICT', class_name: '', week_of_reporting: '', date_of_lecture: '', course_name: '', course_code: '', lecturer_name: user?.name || '', actual_students_present: 0, total_students_registered: 0, venue: '', scheduled_time: '', topic_taught: '', learning_outcomes: '', recommendations: '' }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); try { await submitReport({ ...formData, lecturer_id: user.id, actual_students_present: parseInt(formData.actual_students_present), total_students_registered: parseInt(formData.total_students_registered) }); alert('Report submitted successfully!'); // Reset form setFormData({ faculty_name: 'ICT', class_name: '', week_of_reporting: '', date_of_lecture: '', course_name: '', course_code: '', lecturer_name: user?.name || '', actual_students_present: 0, total_students_registered: 0, venue: '', scheduled_time: '', topic_taught: '', learning_outcomes: '', recommendations: '' }); } catch (error) { alert('Error submitting report: ' + (error.response?.data?.message || error.message)); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (

Submit Lecture Report
